Name: Izanami
Equipment_Options: This model is equipped with Amenonuhoko.

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: Any attack that targets this model is treated as having a Rend characteristic of 0.

In each tactics step select an enemy Formation within 9” of this model and roll XD6 where X is the number of models in the selected Formation and for each result of 5+ that Formation suffers 1 ethereal damage. In addition, the first time this model is reduced to 0 health roll a D6 for each Formation (friend or foe) within 9” of this model and on a result of 4+ that Formation suffers D3 ethereal damage. Then at the end of the current step return this model to the battlefield as close as possible to its previous position but further than 3” from any enemy Formations with X health remaining where X is the amount of ethereal damage that was caused when this model was reduced to 0 Health. This can bring this model above its starting Health.

Spells.Name: Empower Amenonuhoko (40)
Spells.Effect: Until the end of the turn this model’s Amenonuhoko has a Rend Characteristic of -5, a Damage Characteristic of 6 and gains the Decimating and Serrated (1) abilities.
